Posts.Content: Jan 19, 2010 04:52PM kimann wrote: Hello Arbella,  I chose the 6 weeks RAD (33 treatments). My RAD doc did not recommend the shorter treatment becasue of the lack of long term study data.  I did some research also.  The boost for me-I am told-is focused on the incision: tumor removal site, rather than on the entire breatst. My boost starts in 2 days and I will have 5 treatments then I am finished! Take care of you-Good Luck.
Posts.Title: 3wk plus boost vs. 6 wk radiation? arbella arbella
